scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=backend & npm run dev --workspace=frontend
scripts.dev:backend-python: cd backend-python && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 3001
scripts.dev:python: npm run dev:backend-python & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.start:backend-python: cd backend-python && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3001
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/node_modules backend/dist shared/node_modules node_modules
